sentence: COLUMBUS, Ohio — Governor Mike DeWine (R-OH) has a decision on his hands whether to sign into law or veto a bill approved by the Legislature last week that would ease the way Ohio's ephemeral streams are regulated.
author: John Kosich
title: DeWine weighs on whether or not to ease how Ohio ephemeral streams are regulated
